<S%H7971>Send<s%> me now therefore a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2450>skillful<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and in <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and in <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and in <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and in <S%H710>purple<s%>, and <S%H3758>crimson<s%>, and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and that has <S%H3045>skill<s%> to <S%H6605>engrave<s%> with the skillful <S%H2450>men<s%> that are with me in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, whom <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H3559>provide<s%>.

<S%H7971>Send<s%> me also <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, fir <S%H1265>trees<s%>, and algum <S%H418>trees<s%>, out of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>: for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H3045>skill<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>; <S%H5650>and<s%>, behold, my servants shall be with your <S%H5650>servants<s%>,

<S%H5414>And<s%>, behold, I will give to your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, the <S%H2404>hewers<s%> that <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H4347>beaten<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

Then <S%H2361>Huram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> in <S%H3791>writing<s%>, which he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, Because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H160>loved<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, he has <S%H5414>made<s%> you king over <S%H4428>them<s%>.

<S%H2361>Huram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1288>moreover<s%>, Blessed be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>, who has <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3045>endowed<s%> with <S%H7922>prudence<s%> and <S%H998>understanding<s%>, that might <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and a <S%H1004>house<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>.
And now I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H3045>endowed<s%> with <S%H998>understanding<s%>, of <S%H2361>Huram<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>'s,
